title: 5000 Supporters in 2 weeks
description:
Thank you all for your passionate support. We have reached a nice milestone of over 5000 signatures who are indisputably standing against Domestic Violence and Domestic Abuse. 
You are all amazing. If we can have a voice in one shape or form, even if we don't reach the aim, it is definitely through this petition.
Wherewith one clear message, we are saying to the world, there is 0% tolerance for Domestic Abuse, for men, for women, for children. For All. 

One article said, Johnny Depp versus Amber Heard trial, has given men the hope and strength to come forward. Some anonymously, some with their name upfront. 
And it absolutely beautiful to see that courage that, even we, men, need. 
So, without saying more, continue to share, encourage, sign and BE, whether you are a woman or a man, THE VOICE the men and women need. 
Because they do need you. They do suffer.
Thank you. 
All the best, live strong and with passion.
Tine Gustincic

PS
We know Twitter can get quite crowded, so we created a fan page for Johnny Depp, in support of him to meet with his justice, and for his truth to come out, for which he has waited for over 6 years. 
https://www.facebook.com/WeStandWithJohnnyDepp/
